title: Watkins Harper The Slave Auction - purpose

content.question: Which of the following best explains the overall purpose of Frances Ellen Watkins Harperâ€™s poem?

choices.label: To convey the physical and emotional harm experienced by those sold at slave auction, thus supporting the cause of abolition
To document the full scope of abuses inflicted on enslaved African Americans by their enslavers, thus undermining justifications for slavery
To analyze the economic impact of the slave auctions on the economy of the American South, thus promoting economic change
To advocate for the replacement of slave auctions with a system of selling enslaved workers at fixed prices, thus encouraging better treatment

content.answer: To convey the physical and emotional harm experienced by those sold at slave auction, thus supporting the cause of abolition
